result.execSummary:
The defendant Guy L. Krueger was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Guy L. Krueger is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Guy L. Krueger was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Provide DNA sample.  Continue and Undergo any counseling/treatment per agent.  Not to possess controlled substances w/o valid prescription and must notify agent w/in 48 hours if one is received.  Contact w/victim per the agent's discretion. Absolute Sobriety of alcohol and controlled substances.

If probation/extended supervision revoked or discharges with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Guy L. Krueger

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Court Order Allowing Travel Outside of Continental US

Defendant Guy L. Krueger in court with attorney Andrea Elizabeth Von Hoff.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea to Count 1.  Dismiss Count 2 & 3.  State gives recommendation.  Attorney Von Hoff agrees.  Defendant agrees and understands.    No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court. finds Defendant guilty.  Victim statement reviewed by court and defendant.  Court withholds sentence.
Count 1:
12 months Probation
Submit DNA sample
Continue and undergo any counseling per agent.
Absolute sobriety from alcohol and controlled substances unless you hold a valid Rx. Report Rx to agent within 2 working days.
Contact with victim per the agent's discretion.
$243.00 costs, $200.00 DNA surcharge and $100.00 domestic abuse surcharge & Supervision Fees (PAID THRU PROBATION)
Paperwork handed in court.
Count 2 & 3 Dismissed.

ADDRESS INFO for Guy L. Krueger
Current: PO Box 64, Lake Delton, WI 53940 United States  (Effective: 11-02-2015)
Prior: N609 Hendrick Rd., Lyndon Station, WI 53944 United States
Absolute Sobriety; No poss firearms; No face to face contact w/victim C.K. except for joint therapy; may have verbal communication

Defendant Guy L. Krueger in court w/o counsel.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Victim C.K. appears.   Court lets parties know had conversation w/someone that may have been describing this case over the weekend.  State does not wish to substitute.  Court inquires w/victim.  Victim makes statement.  State objects to lifting the no contact.  Court modifes bond to:  No face to face w/victim with exception of the joint session of therapy; May have verbal communication w/victim
Hearing on no contact order at 10-28-2015 09:30 am

ADDRESS INFO for Guy L. Krueger
Current: N609 Hendrick Rd., Lyndon Station, WI 53944 United States  (Effective: 10-20-2015)
Prior: E8332 North Avenue, Wisconsin Dells, WI 53965
no contact w/C.K. or her residence, absolute sobriety and not to possess any firearms.

Pre-trial conference at 11-06-2015 09:30 am.
Return date at 11-18-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Guy L. Krueger in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Court reads charges and max penalties to DE.  State requests new conditions of no contact w/C.K. or her residence.  DE agrees w/requested conditions.  Advised rights to an attorney.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  Cash bond continued w/amended special bond conditions as follows:  No contact w/C.K. or her residence, absolute sobriety and not to possess any firearms.  DE may go to residence one time upon prior notice and with law enforcement to retrieve belongings if necessary.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 09:30 am.  Return date scheduled for November 18, 2015 at 01:00 pm.  Back on the record, the State notes the DE cannot go to the residence one time like previously ordered as there is a TRO against the DE.  Court advises DE to talk to counsel when he hires one.
